contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} Queens Road is the main shopping area for the [[Clarendon Park, Leicester|Clarendon Park]] area in [[Leicester]]. Notably the road contains [[Leicester Friends Meeting House]] as well as several other Christian places of worship. Although house prices along this street are generally high, there are some very reasonably-priced terrace houses in the midsection. {{Coord|52.617|-1.117|type:landmark_region:GB|display=title}} [[Category:Geography of Leicestershire]] {{Leicestershire-geo-stub}}
